meanings.definition: In an undamaged or unimpaired state.
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact was found intactly buried in the sand.
meanings.sent2: She carefully packed the fragile items to ensure they arrived intactly.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed his trick intactly, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her memory of the event remained intactly preserved in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The melody played intactly, capturing the hearts of all who listened.

meanings.definition: In a complete or whole condition.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was finally completed intactly after hours of effort.
meanings.sent2: The old book was intactly bound, showing no signs of wear.
meanings.sent3: The chef presented the dish intactly arranged, like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The team worked intactly together, achieving their goal seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The plan unfolded intactly, leading to a successful outcome.
